name: Meow Match
description:
The cats have wandered off and it's your job to bring them home again! Paw your way through hundreds of match-3 levels, restoring cat sanctuaries, and a storyline with dozens of unique cats!

It's time for Meow Match! Team up with your kitty companions as you beat match-3 levels and restore once lush and beautiful cat sanctuaries to their former glory. Customize your catio spaces with a variety of decorations and furniture, collect dozens of different cat breeds, dress them up, and enjoy a story told by unique cat personalities.


This game features:

• Restore, decorate, and customize a variety of cat sanctuaries across the globe

• Hundreds of engaging match-3 levels with fun challenges

• Dozens of unique cats to discover, dress up, and bring to your home

• Enjoy a fun and lighthearted storyline told from a feline perspective

• Play offline anywhere, anytime

• Connect with your Facebook friends to share lives
